author: USA TODAY, Molly Stellino, USA TODAY
title: Fact check: Sunlight does not kill the new coronavirus
description: A claim widely circulated on social media says sunlight kills the new coronavirus. We rate this claim false.
content:
We answer the often searched question: "What are the symptoms of coronavirus versus the flu?"
USA TODAY
The claim: Sunlight kills the new coronavirus
An article on a holistic health blog that has been circulating Facebook tells people to go outside to prev… [+4581 chars]
